title: Process Season Ticket Renewal
description: A season ticket holder wants to renew their tickets for the upcoming season but wishes to move to a different seat.

tasks.description: Identify the fan's account and their current seat location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the fan's account details and seat information.

tasks.description: Display a map of available seats for season ticket holders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shows the fan a real-time map of all unrenewed and available seats.

tasks.description: Process the seat change and the renewal payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the fan's seat location for the new season and processes the payment.
